name: protein_projector
title: Protein Projector
summary: Runs Protein Projector from Cell Mapping Toolkit

inputSpec.name: input_rocrate
inputSpec.label: Input Training/Test RO-Crate
inputSpec.help: Tar or tar.gz file of RO-Crate directory containing training or test data adhering to format of test or train RO-Crates noted here: https://aixport.readthedocs.io/en/latest/inputs.html

inputSpec.name: mode
inputSpec.label: Processing Mode
inputSpec.help: Processing mode for the model, [train,test,predict,optimizetrain] as noted here: https://aixport.readthedocs.io/en/latest/expectedmodelinterface.html

inputSpec.name: model
inputSpec.label: Trained Model
inputSpec.help: Tar or tar.gz RO-Crate containing the trained model, only needed for 'test' or 'predict' mode as noted here: https://aixport.readthedocs.io/en/latest/inputs.html
